sections.heading: contracts; contractor; provide information
sections.text: Beginning on July 1, 2014, each contract awarded by the Department of Administrative Services shall require that the contractors provide to the department any and all information needed for compliance with section 73-603.SourceLaws 2014, LB371, ยง 4.

73-604.Certain contracts; contractor; provide information.

Beginning on July 1, 2014, each contract awarded by the Department of Administrative Services shall require that the contractors provide to the department any and all information needed for compliance with section 73-603.

SourceLaws 2014, LB371, ยง 4.
